title: Rivalries Matter More Than Titles
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: The slap, UNC-Duke, love for Saint Peter's and your stories about losing your significant others to famous people!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on actor Will Smith slapping comedian Chris Rock on stage at The Oscars on Sunday night (1:30), as well as the upcoming rematch of fierce rivals Duke and UNC at the Final Four (15:30). Plus, an IYHH including "digital rest stops" for "doomscrolling" (26:00), and your voicemails from that time a celeb stole your significant other (34:47)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @alexisnews shares that a couple stole a Paulding school bus for ‘joyride’ before crashing: https://bit.ly/3ILgqG0
  2. @TaylorLorenz says 'doomscrolling got you down? Take a break at a digital rest stop': https://wapo.st/3qHMd4v
  3. @KatieHunt20 says Amazon is near tipping point of shifting from rainforest to savannah: https://cnn.it/3NvynM2
